remarks: Transfer (part of) vector independence condition from domain to range of projectivity ` mapd ` .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2015.)
statement:
mapdindp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdindp.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdindp.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdindp.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
mapdindp.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdindp.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdindp.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
mapdindp.j $e |- J = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
mapdindp.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdindp.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
mapdindp.mx $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( J ` { F } ) ) $.
mapdindp.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
mapdindp.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
mapdindp.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. D ) $.
mapdindp.my $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { Y } ) ) = ( J ` { G } ) ) $.
mapdindp.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
mapdindp.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. D ) $.
mapdindp.mg $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { Z } ) ) = ( J ` { E } ) ) $.
mapdindp.xn $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y , Z } ) ) $.
mapdindp $p |- ( ph -> -. F e. ( J ` { G , E } ) ) $.
